Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent of the farm fires in South Africa by using images from other countries.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the fires were intentionally started.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the fires shown in the images are related to the farm fires in South Africa, when in fact they are from different incidents in other countries.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the fires in South Africa may have been accidental or caused by natural factors, rather than intentional acts.
